CustomField.description: It is the combination of SourceSystem and CertificateNumber with the format as SourceSystem-PolicyNumber-CertificateNumber-SequenceNumber. PolicyNumber will be got by joining PolicyID with PolicyReference Object. The purpose is only to support the API integration pattern with the unique ExternalID for SFDC limitation and performance.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: It is the combination of SourceSystem and CertificateNumber with the format as SourceSystem-PolicyNumber-CertificateNumber-SequenceNumber. PolicyNumber will be got by joining PolicyID with PolicyReference Object.
CustomField.label: Integration Key
